columns.name: customer_gateway_id
columns.description: The ID of the customer gateway.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of VPN connection the customer gateway supports (ipsec.1).

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the customer gateway (pending | available | deleting | deleted).

columns.name: bgp_asn
columns.description: The customer gateway's Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN).

columns.name: certificate_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the customer gateway certificate.

columns.name: device_name
columns.description: The name of customer gateway device.

columns.name: ip_address
columns.description: The Internet-routable IP address of the customer gateway's outside interface.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to customer gateway.
